title: Why MVC is so Imp?
description: MVC is important to understand because it is the basic structure which most web applications are built on. .

title: What are middleware in Express?
description: Middleware functions are functions that have access to the request object ( req ), the response object ( res ), and the next function in the application's request-response cycle

title: Router function
description: The express. Router() function is used to create a new router object
